body.name: Oral-B iO Series 3 Limited Rechargeable Electric Powered Toothbrush, Black with 2 Brush Heads and Travel Case - Visible Pressure Sensor to Protect Gums - 3 Modes - 2 Minute Timer
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 4 hrs 23 mins
features: FOR HEALTHIER GUMS IN JUST 1 WEEK remove 100% more plaque* with ORAL-B’s MOST ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY *vs a manual brush
PROTECT YOUR GUMS WITH iO PRESSURE SENSOR, Oral-B's only one to signal if you are applying the PERFECT PRESSURE for an effective and safe clean
Always MAXIMIZE YOUR CLEAN with iO LIGHTRING TIMER -that celebrates a dentist recommended 2-minute brush- and REFILL CHANGE ALERT
PERSONALIZE YOUR BRUSHING choosing among 3 CLEANING MODES: Daily Clean, Sensitive, Whitening
Oral-B ROUND brush heads REACH WHERE RECTANGULAR manual brushes DON'T. Experience our BEST CLEAN from Oral-B, brand most used by dentists worldwide
Benefit from a LONG-LASTING CHARGE with the Lithium-ion battery
body.description: The iO is Oral-B's best technology: Clinically Proven 400% More Plaque Removal Along Gumline versus a regular manual toothbrush. A Round head and gentle micro-vibrations, the Magnetic interaction delivers smooth, harmonious motion through a Synchronized cleaning action (micro-vibrations synced with oscillations). A Built-in-2-Minute Timer ensures an even easier experience, helping you get an optimal clean on all your teeth. The Oral-B's quadrant timer breaks the two minutes up into four 30-second intervals to clean each quadrant of your mouth; we keep the time, so you don't have to. Delivering the perfect pressure is done by having a Pressure Sensor. The Pressure Sensor Indicates optimal cleaning pressure and warns of over pressure. With an accompanying travel case, you'll have a fresh clean everywhere you go. We're with you on your next trip or even your mid-day on-the go brushing! Best of all, it is brought to you by Oral-B-the #1 brand used by dentists worldwide.* *Based on surveys of a representative worldwide sample of dentists carried out for P&G regularly. Do not use on children under age 3. Replace brush (head) every 3 months or sooner if brush head becomes worn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush is amazing! There is feedback about the pressure you’re using on your teeth on a small ring around the handle for the amount of pressure you are applying and it vibrates every thirty seconds so you know it’s time to move on to the next quadrant in your mouth. The brush itself works amazingly well. My teeth feel as clean after every brushing as they do after leaving the dentist’s office. Highly recommend, especially if you can get on sale although it’s worth the full price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This toothbrush does all the work and thinking for you
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush does everything you need. It has the power to completely clean your teeth while it lets you know if your pressing too hard and even shuts off when you've complete the task.Works really well and is very impressive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So that’s what I’ve been missing out on!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been a Phillips Sonicare user for close to a decade. I switched from a regular toothbrush and never looked back. But I always felt I was missing out on getting truly clean. Oral B was always on my mind but never what I bought. It took two things for me to switch, Phillips’s bad customer service and my dentist mentioning my back molars are hard to reach because they grew out wrong. They suggested Oral B because it would be able to reach where the larger Sonicare heads couldn’t. So when my handle battery started giving out I knew it was time to switch. The switch was WORTH IT. It’s my perfect brush. The oscillating is so much better than the vibrating. The handle is large and comfortable. The heads are quite nice and do an excellent job at cleaning at any setting. The charger is nice and the case being included for travel, nice touch. I’m mostly impressed with the singular smart feature, a pressure sensor that lights green, white and red. I do not want my toothbrush to be dependent on Bluetooth or WiFi. I don’t want an app, but this, this is perfect! It’s just a visual cue on whether or not you’re brushing hard enough or too hard. That really sold me. Bear in mind, you do need to take some care to get the longest life out of these German made beauties. Mostly just rinse the head and handle after every brushing. That’s why the head removes so easily, it’s detailed in the manual. Follow that, and you’ll avoid the nasty buildup that can happen with these style brushes. If you’re on the fence, give it a shot. It’s been a game changer for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Brushes teeth very well
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toothbrush because I didn't think conventional brushing was doing the job well enough. I was pleasantly surprised at how well it does in removing plaque at the gum line. I charged it when it came as directed. The battery lasted a week with twice daily brushing and charged nicely overnight. Many of the features are great! The green light tells when the pressure is correct and the red light tells you if you brush too hard. The prompt tells you when to switch quarters (30 seconds), this is very nice. Dancing lights tell you if you have brushed for two minutes. Great if you have kids. I do find that I can't tell what cycle the brush is in, so I don't know if I'm in the cleaning, whitening or the other mode. There are two types of brushes that came with this model but I don't know the difference between them or what they are for. The print in the owner's manual is so small, you need a powerful magnifying glass to read them. I would give five stars if the issues I mentioned were addressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush changed the game for me. I saw a video on TikTok from a dentist that uses this one. It works great and comes with a replacement head. It also has a travel case which I love as well. This is well worth the price and makes my mouth feel very clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have found this toothbrush to be easy to use and does a good job of cleaning my teeth. It comes with two brushes and a travel case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oral-B Series 3 is the Best quality toothbrush for Price
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the Oral-B Series 3 for the past 3 weeks. I have already begun to notice the difference, my teeth are brighter and the clean an refreshing feeling of your teeth, month, gums an tongue after only 2 minutes of brushing. This is an excellent toothbrush for the price, I would buy it again and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Electric toothbrush review
reviews.reviewText: It works great! Much better than a regular toothbrush. I have seen a significant reduction in yellowing since I started using it. I don't like the sonic brushes, but this one is great.
a worthwhile investment for dental care
